item.title: 21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away
item.description:
21 Amazing Treehouse Accommodations | Travel Away

Take a break from hotels and resorts and get back to nature with one of these amazing treehouse accommodations that combine comfort with the thrill of being immersed in nature. Some of them are rustic cabins built into the canopy of majestic trees, others make for luxurious nature retreats, yet others are true architectural marvels with high-tech interiors and contemporary amenities.

item.title: Best Sailing Destinations in Europe | Travel Away
item.description:
Best Sailing Destinations in Europe | Travel Away

Complementing its natural, cultural and historical richness, Europe prides itself with some of the world's most enchanting and glamorous sailing destinations. From the exclusive South of France to the fascinating old-meets-new jewel that is Turkey, the blue Mediterranean Sea is dotted with countless scenic islands and coasts, posh marinas, spellbinding natural wonders and precious little towns which, along with its perfect climate and sailing conditions, make this part of the world a true yacht lover's dream.

item.title: City Guide Spotlight: New York City
item.description:
City Guide Spotlight: New York City

A few days ahead of NYC's hectic and inspiring Armory Week, Scope and Pulse Art Fairs, we embarked upon an overhaul of our NYC City Guide. While there were some stalwarts that needed to be added, New York City's ever-evolving nature means plenty of brand new spots made the list.
